Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Vhl-1 (XXO, natural AMPs; cyclotides, macrocyclic knotted proteins; flowering seed plants; XXC, 3S=S, UCBB1aB; ZZHp)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: It inhibited HIV-1 infection in cultured human T-lymphoblast (CEM-SS) cells (EC50 870 nM)(Ireland et al., 2008).Structure:You can rotate, zoom, and view the 3D structureherein the PDB.Chemical modification:  Met7 was found to be oxidized to Met sulfoxide by methionine sulfoxide reductase (MsrA; EC 1.8.4.6). Will this oxidation play a role in repair oxidative damage?Updated 2/2014; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Chen B, Colgrave ML, Daly NL, Rosengren KJ, Gustafson KR, Craik DJ.2005
Literature Information.Title: Isolation and characterization of novel cyclotides from Viola hederaceae: solution structure and anti-HIV activity of vhl-1, a leaf-specific expressed cyclotide.
